text: tapO$&syaqnirGna#ntyundaqtIr bala#M dhaqttaujO# dhattaq bala#M dhattaq mA mE# dIqkShAM mA tapOqnirva#dhiqShTEtyA#haiq tadEqva sarva#mAqtman dha#ttEq nAsyaujOq balaqM na dIqkShAM na tapOqnirGna#ntyaqgnirvai dI$kShiqtasya# dEqvatAq sO$&smAdEqtar.hi#tiqra i#vaq yar.hiq yAtiq tamI$Svaqra(gm) rakShA(gm)#siq hantO$ -  [  ]     3
